ACCT 205 - Intro Financial Acct
Reference Number:  021668
Type:  Credit Class
Status:  Open Credit Hours:  3.00
Class Size:  30 Contact Hours:  45.00
Enrolled:  11    
Location:  LSUS    
Term:  Summer Term 2014    
Session:  1A    
Section:  001    
Course Description:
An introductory course intended to familiarize the student with principles and methods of accounting primarily concerned with financial data gathering and presentation in the form of general-purpose external financial statements. Three hours of lecture. 3 cr.
 
View class text book information here.

Begin Date End Date Class Time Day(s) Campus Building/Room
